alert.note: Alert for Stevens (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 9:26PM CST until January 05 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 3 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, continued blowing and drifting snow as winds gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Stevens County. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 9 AM CST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 AM to 3 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. In addition, wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
